node.title: The Science of Thankfulness
node.description: The Bible enjoins gratitude and thanksgiving – not only in good times but “always” (Philippians 4:4). And it even makes sweeping claims about the benefits, both mental (Philippians 4:6, 7) and physical (Proverbs 17:22), of a positive, grateful attitude. In this message we look at fascinating scientific studies that underscore the Bible’s injunctions of thankfulness. We were made for praise!
